name: Take Me Home (Post-Miu)
description:
Due to the Torrential Rains, the promising summer camp you where expecting all the course, has been cancelled. You are on the highway home, it's raining  cats and dogs, it's getting dark and your only possible entertainment is your "Good Boy" system. The only problem (or problems) is that the screen of the device can only be seen in the light and, also, what a surprise, you're running out of batteries. You must try to finish the game using the streetlights before the battery ends on your long looooong way home...

This game is submitted to the #GMTKJam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse: Move the camera around.
  • 'E' when facing "Good Boy": toggle device "game mode".
  • 'A' and 'D': Move the "Good Boy" character.
  • "SPACE": Jump with the "Good Boy" character.
  • "ESCAPE": Exit the game.
  • 'R': Restart the game.
